definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

sentences.english: It’s already snowing in New York! This year it also snowed in October.
sentences.chinese: 在紐約已經下雪了，今年在十月也下過雪。

sentences.english: I never think of snow but I think of my youth.
sentences.chinese: 一想到下雪，我就會想起我的青年時代。

sentences.english: Ordinarily it should be snowing at this time of the year.
If it snows tomorrow, we will build a snowman.
sentences.chinese: 明天如果下雪，我們就堆雪人。

sentences.english: It was actually snowing very hard a few miles uphill toward Cottonwood Pass.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，下雪時即使幾英里也很難登上卡頓山口。

sentences.english: It also experiences snow and Delhi never does .
sentences.chinese: 倫敦還會下雪，而德里從來不下雪。

sentences.english: It also experiences snow and Delhi never does .
sentences.chinese: 倫敦還會下雪，而德里從來不下雪。

sentences.english: EVEN allowing for snow, the medieval Old Town of Tallinn is unnaturally quiet.
sentences.chinese: 就算考慮到下雪，古老的塔林鎮也安靜得有點異常。

sentences.english: It was snowing when he arrived at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 他到達機場時天正下雪。

sentences.english: Will here be snow-fall this year in Suzhou?
sentences.chinese: 蘇州今年冬天會下雪嗎？

sentences.english: Doris:There is snow on Yangmingshan. Let's go visit the mountain together.
sentences.chinese: 陽明山下雪了耶，我們一起上山去看好不好。

sentences.english: It was snowing, and getting dark.
This year's waterfront is probably snowed again.
sentences.chinese: 今年的臨海大概是又要下雪了。

sentences.english: Snow sugars if the weather becomes warm and the cold again there after.
sentences.chinese: 下雪之後天氣轉暖又變冷，雪就變成了顆粒狀。

sentences.english: Do you want to let me wonder how to hate you? In such a snowy night in the norland, I will remain awake again.
sentences.chinese: 在北國這一個下雪的晚上，又將無眠。

definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
Daxue or Great Snow, 21st of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st December
goose feather snow (idiom)/big heavy snow fall
cold weather, frozen ground (idiom); bitterly cold
